name: TickTick
0:
”Alexa, ask TickTick what is in my inbox?”
”Alexa, ask TickTick what are my to-dos for Today?”
”Alexa, ask TickTick to remind me to go to gym at 8pm.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tick tick
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The TickTick Skill makes it fast and easy to manage your TickTick tasks by voice. After enabling the TickTick Skill on Alexa, you can start the conversation by saying “Alexa, open Tick Tick.” Simply ask Alexa to add new tasks or read off your tasks. Sign up or sign in TickTick at ticktick.com to get started.

After saying “Alexa, open Tick Tick.”
 Ask Alexa to read out what tasks do you have in a certain list. 
 - What is in my inbox?
 Ask Alexa to tell you what to-dos do you have for today to plan the day ahead.
 - What are my to-dos for Today?
 Add a task with reminder from Alexa to TickTick.
 - Remind me to go to gym at 8pm.
 Add task to a specific list.
 - Add a task meeting to work list.
 Ask Alexa what’s your next task to stay on track of your day.
 - What's my next task？

If you use Example Phrases directly to complete this command eg: "Alexa, ask TickTick what is in my inbox?", then you enter a Conversation with TickTick. In this case, just say:
 - "What is in my inbox?"
 - "What are my to-dos for Today?"
 - "To remind me to go to gym at 8pm."

Say stop or bye to quit.
